main event: On April 7, 1967, an anonymous witness observed an unidentified flying object in Newburgh, New York, described as a bright, luminous sphere that hovered silently before rapidly ascending and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, approximately 40-50 feet in diameter., The witness observed the object for about 5-7 minutes., Attempts to obtain photographic evidence were unsuccessful due to poor quality., The case was investigated by Project Blue Book and classified as 'unidentified'. , The object exhibited rapid changes in direction and altitude, with no sound associated.
